Detailed Description

ChronicleLogger can be use to log anything to a given OutputDevice by default two implementaion of OutputDevice is given. one is Console i.e: stdout and another one is a DiskFile

By default there are 6 log levels: Level 0 - if log level is set to zero, nothing will be logged
Level 1 - Fatal Error, when the appliction must be stopped due to very serious error
Level 2 - Critical Error, but the application may continue working
Level 3 - Warning message Level 4 - Any informational message
Level 5 - Debug message for the developer

Instance of ChronicleLogger is immutable and threadsafe

Requirements:

  • Standard ANSI C++, 32-bit compiler
